00053 /**************************************************************************/
00057 static volatile uint32_t channelValues[LESENSE_CHANNELS] =
00058 {
00059 /*  Ch0,   Ch1,   Ch2,   Ch3,   Ch4,   Ch5,   Ch6,   Ch7    */
00060   0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0,
00061 /*  Ch8,   Ch9,   Ch10,  Ch11,  Ch12,  Ch13,  Ch14,  Ch15   */
00062   0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0
00063 };
00064

00066 /**************************************************************************/
00070 static volatile uint32_t channelMaxValues[LESENSE_CHANNELS] =
00071 {
00072 /*  Ch0,   Ch1,   Ch2,   Ch3,   Ch4,   Ch5,   Ch6,   Ch7    */
00073   1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1,
00074 /*  Ch8,   Ch9,   Ch11,  Ch11,  Ch12,  Ch13,  Ch14,  Ch15   */
00075   1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1
00076 };

00105 /**************************************************************************/
00108 void CAPLESENSE_setupCMU(void)
00109 {
00110   /* Ensure core frequency has been updated */
00111   SystemCoreClockUpdate();
00112 
00113   /* Select clock source for HF clock. */
00114   CMU_ClockSelectSet(cmuClock_HF, cmuSelect_HFRCO);
00115   /* Select clock source for LFA clock. */
00116   CMU_ClockSelectSet(cmuClock_LFA, cmuSelect_LFRCO);
00117   /* Select clock source for LFB clock. */
00118   CMU_ClockSelectSet(cmuClock_LFB, cmuSelect_Disabled);
00119 
00120   /* Enable HF peripheral clock. */
00121   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_HFPER, 1);
00122   /* Enable clock for GPIO. */
00123   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_GPIO, 1);
00124   /* Enable clock for ACMP0. */
00125   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_ACMP0, 1);
00126   /* Enable clock for ACMP1. */
00127   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_ACMP1, 1);
00128   /* Enable CORELE clock. */
00129   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_CORELE, 1);
00130   /* Enable clock for LESENSE. */
00131   CMU_ClockEnable(cmuClock_LESENSE, 1);
00132 
00133   /* Enable clock divider for LESENSE. */
00134   CMU_ClockDivSet(cmuClock_LESENSE, cmuClkDiv_1);
00135 }

00138 /**************************************************************************/
00141 void CAPLESENSE_setupGPIO(void)
00142 {
00143   /* Configure the drive strength of the ports for the light sensor. */
00144   GPIO_DriveModeSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER_PORT0, gpioDriveModeStandard);
00145 
00146   /* Initialize the 4 GPIO pins of the touch slider for using them as LESENSE
00147    * scan channels for capacitive sensing. */
00148   GPIO_PinModeSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER_PORT0, CAPLESENSE_SLIDER0_PIN, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00149   GPIO_PinModeSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER_PORT0, CAPLESENSE_SLIDER1_PIN, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00150   GPIO_PinModeSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER_PORT0, CAPLESENSE_SLIDER2_PIN, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00151   GPIO_PinModeSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER_PORT0, CAPLESENSE_SLIDER3_PIN, gpioModeDisabled, 0);
00152 }

00155 /**************************************************************************/
00158 void CAPLESENSE_setupACMP(void)
00159 {
00160   /* ACMP capsense configuration constant table. */
00161   static const ACMP_CapsenseInit_TypeDef initACMP =
00162   {
00163     .fullBias                 = false,
00164     .halfBias                 = false,
00165     .biasProg                 =                  0x7,
00166     .warmTime                 = acmpWarmTime512,
00167     .hysteresisLevel          = acmpHysteresisLevel7,
00168     .resistor                 = acmpResistor0,
00169     .lowPowerReferenceEnabled = false,
00170     .vddLevel                 =                 0x3D,
00171     .enable                   = false
00172   };
00173 
00174 
00175   /* Configure ACMP locations, ACMP output to pin disabled. */
00176   ACMP_GPIOSetup(ACMP0, 0, false, false);
00177   ACMP_GPIOSetup(ACMP1, 0, false, false);
00178 
00179   /* Initialize ACMPs in capacitive sense mode. */
00180   ACMP_CapsenseInit(ACMP0, &initACMP);
00181   ACMP_CapsenseInit(ACMP1, &initACMP);
00182 
00183   /* Don't enable ACMP, LESENSE controls it! */
00184 }

00187 /**************************************************************************/
00192 void CAPLESENSE_setupLESENSE(bool sleep)
00193 {
00194   uint8_t     i;
00195   static bool init = true;
00196 
00197   /* Array for storing the calibration values. */
00198   static uint16_t capsenseCalibrateVals[4];
00199 
00200   /* LESENSE channel configuration constant table in sense mode. */
00201   static const LESENSE_ChAll_TypeDef initChsSense = LESENSE_CAPSENSE_SCAN_CONF_SENSE;
00202   /* LESENSE channel configuration constant table in sleep mode. */
00203   static const LESENSE_ChAll_TypeDef initChsSleep = LESENSE_CAPSENSE_SCAN_CONF_SLEEP;
00204   /* LESENSE central configuration constant table. */
00205   static const LESENSE_Init_TypeDef  initLESENSE =
00206   {
00207     .coreCtrl         =
00208     {
00209       .scanStart    = lesenseScanStartPeriodic,
00210       .prsSel       = lesensePRSCh0,
00211       .scanConfSel  = lesenseScanConfDirMap,
00212       .invACMP0     = false,
00213       .invACMP1     = false,
00214       .dualSample   = false,
00215       .storeScanRes = false,
00216       .bufOverWr    = true,
00217       .bufTrigLevel = lesenseBufTrigHalf,
00218       .wakeupOnDMA  = lesenseDMAWakeUpDisable,
00219       .biasMode     = lesenseBiasModeDutyCycle,
00220       .debugRun     = false
00221     },
00222 
00223     .timeCtrl         =
00224     {
00225       .startDelay     =          0U
00226     },
00227 
00228     .perCtrl          =
00229     {
00230       .dacCh0Data     = lesenseDACIfData,
00231       .dacCh0ConvMode = lesenseDACConvModeDisable,
00232       .dacCh0OutMode  = lesenseDACOutModeDisable,
00233       .dacCh1Data     = lesenseDACIfData,
00234       .dacCh1ConvMode = lesenseDACConvModeDisable,
00235       .dacCh1OutMode  = lesenseDACOutModeDisable,
00236       .dacPresc       =                        0U,
00237       .dacRef         = lesenseDACRefBandGap,
00238       .acmp0Mode      = lesenseACMPModeMuxThres,
00239       .acmp1Mode      = lesenseACMPModeMuxThres,
00240       .warmupMode     = lesenseWarmupModeNormal
00241     },
00242 
00243     .decCtrl          =
00244     {
00245       .decInput  = lesenseDecInputSensorSt,
00246       .chkState  = false,
00247       .intMap    = true,
00248       .hystPRS0  = false,
00249       .hystPRS1  = false,
00250       .hystPRS2  = false,
00251       .hystIRQ   = false,
00252       .prsCount  = true,
00253       .prsChSel0 = lesensePRSCh0,
00254       .prsChSel1 = lesensePRSCh1,
00255       .prsChSel2 = lesensePRSCh2,
00256       .prsChSel3 = lesensePRSCh3
00257     }
00258   };
00259 
00260   /* Only initialize main LESENSE parameters once. */
00261   if (init)
00262   {
00263     /* Initialize LESENSE interface with RESET. */
00264     LESENSE_Init(&initLESENSE, true);
00265   }
00266 
00267   /* Different configuration for "sleep" and "sense" modes. */
00268   if (sleep)
00269   {
00270     /* Stop LESENSE before configuration. */
00271     LESENSE_ScanStop();
00272 
00273     /* Wait until the currently active scan is finished. */
00274     while (LESENSE_STATUS_SCANACTIVE & LESENSE_StatusGet()) ;
00275 
00276     /* Clear result buffer. */
00277     LESENSE_ResultBufferClear();
00278 
00279     /* Set scan frequency (in Hz). */
00280     (void) LESENSE_ScanFreqSet(0U, 4U);
00281 
00282     /* Set clock divisor for LF clock. */
00283     LESENSE_ClkDivSet(lesenseClkLF, lesenseClkDiv_1);
00284 
00285     /* Configure scan channels. */
00286     LESENSE_ChannelAllConfig(&initChsSleep);
00287 
00288     /* Restore calibration values. */
00289     LESENSE_ChannelThresSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER0_PIN, CAPLESENSE_ACMP_VDD_SCALE, capsenseCalibrateVals[0]);
00290     LESENSE_ChannelThresSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER1_PIN, CAPLESENSE_ACMP_VDD_SCALE, capsenseCalibrateVals[1]);
00291     LESENSE_ChannelThresSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER2_PIN, CAPLESENSE_ACMP_VDD_SCALE, capsenseCalibrateVals[2]);
00292     LESENSE_ChannelThresSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER3_PIN, CAPLESENSE_ACMP_VDD_SCALE, capsenseCalibrateVals[3]);
00293 
00294     /* Disable scan complete interrupt. */
00295     LESENSE_IntDisable(LESENSE_IEN_SCANCOMPLETE);
00296   }
00297   else
00298   {
00299     /* Stop LESENSE before configuration. */
00300     LESENSE_ScanStop();
00301 
00302     /* Wait until the currently active scan is finished. */
00303     while (LESENSE_STATUS_SCANACTIVE & LESENSE_StatusGet()) ;
00304 
00305     /* Clean scan complete interrupt flag. */
00306     LESENSE_IntClear(LESENSE_IEN_SCANCOMPLETE);
00307 
00308     /* Clear result buffer. */
00309     LESENSE_ResultBufferClear();
00310 
00311     /* Set scan frequency (in Hz). */
00312     (void) LESENSE_ScanFreqSet(0U, 64U);
00313 
00314     /* Set clock divisor for LF clock. */
00315     LESENSE_ClkDivSet(lesenseClkLF, lesenseClkDiv_8);
00316 
00317     /* Configure scan channels. */
00318     LESENSE_ChannelAllConfig(&initChsSense);
00319 
00320     /* Enable scan complete interrupt. */
00321     LESENSE_IntEnable(LESENSE_IEN_SCANCOMPLETE);
00322   }
00323 
00324   /* Enable LESENSE interrupt in NVIC. */
00325   NVIC_EnableIRQ(LESENSE_IRQn);
00326 
00327   /* Start scanning LESENSE channels. */
00328   LESENSE_ScanStart();
00329 
00330   /* Run it only once. */
00331   if (init)
00332   {
00333     /* Assuming that the pads are not touched at first, we can use the result as
00334      * the threshold value to calibrate the capacitive sensing in LESENSE. */
00335     init = false;
00336 
00337     /* Waiting for buffer to be full. */
00338     while (!(LESENSE->STATUS & LESENSE_STATUS_BUFHALFFULL)) ;
00339 
00340     /* Read out steady state values from LESENSE for calibration. */
00341     for (i = 0U; i < CAPLESENSE_NUMOF_SLIDERS; i++)
00342     {
00343       capsenseCalibrateVals[i] = LESENSE_ScanResultDataBufferGet(i) - CAPLESENSE_SENSITIVITY_OFFS;
00344     }
00345 
00346     /* Set calibration values. */
00347     LESENSE_ChannelThresSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER0_PIN, CAPLESENSE_ACMP_VDD_SCALE, capsenseCalibrateVals[0]);
00348     LESENSE_ChannelThresSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER1_PIN, CAPLESENSE_ACMP_VDD_SCALE, capsenseCalibrateVals[1]);
00349     LESENSE_ChannelThresSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER2_PIN, CAPLESENSE_ACMP_VDD_SCALE, capsenseCalibrateVals[2]);
00350     LESENSE_ChannelThresSet(CAPLESENSE_SLIDER3_PIN, CAPLESENSE_ACMP_VDD_SCALE, capsenseCalibrateVals[3]);
00351   }
00352 }

00355 /**************************************************************************/
00360 void CAPLESENSE_setupCallbacks(void (*scanCb)(void), void (*chCb)(void))
00361 {
00362   lesenseScanCb = scanCb;
00363   lesenseChCb   = chCb;
00364 }

00367 /**************************************************************************/
00370 void LESENSE_IRQHandler(void)
00371 {
00372   uint32_t count;
00373 
00374 
00375   /* LESENSE scan complete interrupt. */
00376   if (LESENSE_IF_SCANCOMPLETE & LESENSE_IntGetEnabled())
00377   {
00378     LESENSE_IntClear(LESENSE_IF_SCANCOMPLETE);
00379 
00380     /* Iterate trough all channels */
00381     for (currentChannel = 0; currentChannel < LESENSE_CHANNELS; currentChannel++)
00382     {
00383       /* If this channel is not in use, skip to the next one */
00384       if (!channelsInUse[currentChannel])
00385       {
00386         continue;
00387       }
00388 
00389       /* Read out value from LESENSE buffer */
00390       count = LESENSE_ScanResultDataGet();
00391 
00392       /* Store value in channelValues */
00393       channelValues[currentChannel] = count;
00394 
00395       /* Update channelMaxValues */
00396       if (count > channelMaxValues[currentChannel])
00397       {
00398         channelMaxValues[currentChannel] = count;
00399       }
00400     }
00401 
00402     /* Call callback function. */
00403     if (lesenseScanCb != 0x00000000)
00404     {
00405       lesenseScanCb();
00406     }
00407   }
00408 
00409   /* LESENSE channel interrupt. */
00410   if (CAPLESENSE_CHANNEL_INT & LESENSE_IntGetEnabled())
00411   {
00412     /* Clear flags. */
00413     LESENSE_IntClear(CAPLESENSE_CHANNEL_INT);
00414 
00415     /* Call callback function. */
00416     if (lesenseChCb != 0x00000000)
00417     {
00418       lesenseChCb();
00419     }
00420   }
00421 }

00424 /**************************************************************************/
00429 uint8_t  CAPLESENSE_getSegmentChannel(uint8_t capSegment)
00430 {
00431   uint8_t channel;
00432 
00433   switch (capSegment)
00434   {
00435   case(0):
00436     channel = SLIDER_PART0_CHANNEL;
00437     break;
00438   case(1):
00439     channel = SLIDER_PART1_CHANNEL;
00440     break;
00441   case(2):
00442     channel = SLIDER_PART2_CHANNEL;
00443     break;
00444   default:
00445     channel = SLIDER_PART3_CHANNEL;
00446     break;
00447   }
00448   return channel;
00449 
00450 }

00453 /**************************************************************************/
00458 uint32_t CAPLESENSE_getVal(uint8_t channel)
00459 {
00460   return channelValues[channel];
00461 }
00462 
00463 /**************************************************************************/
00468 uint32_t CAPLESENSE_getNormalizedVal(uint8_t channel)
00469 {
00470   uint32_t max = channelMaxValues[channel];
00471   return (channelValues[channel] << 8) / max;
00472 }

00476 /**************************************************************************/
00481 int32_t CAPLESENSE_getSliderPosition(void)
00482 {
00483   int      i;
00484   int      minPos = -1;
00485   uint32_t minVal = 236; /* adjust it */
00486   /* Values used for interpolation. There is two more which represents the edges.
00487    * This makes the interpolation code a bit cleaner as we do not have to make special
00488    * cases for handling them */
00489   uint32_t interpol[6]      = { 255, 255, 255, 255, 255, 255 };
00490   uint32_t channelPattern[] = { 0,                        SLIDER_PART0_CHANNEL + 1,
00491                                 SLIDER_PART1_CHANNEL + 1,
00492                                 SLIDER_PART2_CHANNEL + 1,
00493                                 SLIDER_PART3_CHANNEL + 1 };
00494 
00495   /* The calculated slider position. */
00496   int position;
00497 
00498   /* Iterate through the 4 slider bars and calculate the current value divided by
00499    * the maximum value multiplied by 256.
00500    * Note that there is an offset of 1 between channelValues and interpol.
00501    * This is done to make interpolation easier.
00502    */
00503   for (i = 1; i < CAPLESENSE_NUMOF_SLIDERS + 1; i++)
00504   {
00505     /* interpol[i] will be in the range 0-256 depending on channelMax */
00506     interpol[i]  = channelValues[channelPattern[i] - 1] << 8;
00507     interpol[i] /= channelMaxValues[channelPattern[i] - 1];
00508     /* Find the minimum value and position */
00509     if (interpol[i] < minVal)
00510     {
00511       minVal = interpol[i];
00512       minPos = i;
00513     }
00514   }
00515   /* Check if the slider has not been touched */
00516   if (minPos == -1)
00517     return -1;
00518 
00519   /* Start position. Shift by 4 to get additional resolution. */
00520   /* Because of the interpol trick earlier we have to substract one to offset that effect */
00521   position = (minPos - 1) << 4;
00522 
00523   /* Interpolate with pad to the left */
00524   position -= ((256 - interpol[minPos - 1]) << 3)
00525               / (256 - interpol[minPos]);
00526 
00527   /* Interpolate with pad to the right */
00528   position += ((256 - interpol[minPos + 1]) << 3)
00529               / (256 - interpol[minPos]);
00530 
00531   return position;
00532 }

00535 /**************************************************************************/
00538 void CAPLESENSE_Sleep(void)
00539 {
00540   /* Go to EM2 and wait for the measurement to complete. */
00541   EMU_EnterEM2(true);
00542 }
00543

00545 /**************************************************************************/
00548 void CAPLESENSE_Init(void)
00549 {
00550   /* Disable interrupts */
00551   INT_Disable();
00552 
00553   /* Setup CMU. */
00554   CAPLESENSE_setupCMU();
00555   /* Setup GPIO. */
00556   CAPLESENSE_setupGPIO();
00557   /* Setup ACMP. */
00558   CAPLESENSE_setupACMP();
00559   /* Setup LESENSE. */
00560   CAPLESENSE_setupLESENSE(true);
00561 
00562   /* Initialization done, enable interrupts globally. */
00563   INT_Enable();
00564 }
